DOC.brief_summary: The study will investigate the effects of single dose pre-operative oral dose of gabapentin (1200) on post -operative pain scores and oral analgesic requirements.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Operative Pain Scores and Analgesic Requirements After Elective Inguinal Herniorrhaphy
DOC.detailed_description: The study will benefit patients in reducing post-operative pain scores as well as reduction in oral analgesic consumption. Gabapentin has been shown to reduce post operative pain pain scores in breast surgery, hysterectomy , spinal surgery, orthopedic and thyroid surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects having elective surgery with open unilateral Inguinal herniorraphy Non elective surgery Patients currently on gabapentin therapy Patient hypersensitive to gabapentin surgery History of alcohol or drug abuse Patients who are pregnant or who are nursing
DOC.keyword: analgesia requirement and post operative pain
